## EditorPlugin.onText() method

May be provided to let the plugin respond to text \[`paste` events\](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/Element/paste\_event) or drop events

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onText?(text: string): void | {
        state?: StateTypeSerializedType<S>;
    };
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                | Description     |
| --------- | ------------------- | --------------- |
| text      | <code>string</code> | The pasted text |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void | { state?: StateTypeSerializedType<S>; }`
